selected.title: gamestop-posts-narrower-loss-in-q2-as-bitcoin-holdings-lift-
selected.summary: GameStop Corp. has announced its financial results for the second quarter, revealing a narrower loss than in previous quarters. The company's move to integrate cryptocurrency, particularly Bitcoin, into its balance sheet appears to be paying off as it navigates through an evolving retail landscape.

selected.title: crypto-payroll-solutions-transforming-fintech-startups-in-as
selected.summary: As the fintech landscape continues to evolve across Asia, innovative payroll solutions utilizing cryptocurrency are emerging as a transformative force for startups in the region. OneSafe, a notable player in this field, exemplifies how these digital solutions are revolutionizing traditional payroll processes.
